msg:I chose the Kempinski Hotel for the city camping room. It turns out that the hotel is really good in all aspects. The city camping room is a suite. The living room is a large tent bed with several dolls and a rocking horse. The child was very excited to see the tent. I took her to sleep here at night. It was very spacious for two people to sleep. In addition, the living room is also equipped with a purifier, brushes, drawing paper, and building blocks for children to play. I made a special note when booking the room. Welcome desserts were given for two days, but my gender was wrong. I hope to pay attention next time. During the two-day stay, every staff member I met in the hotel was very friendly and enthusiastic. Shiraz, the red letter girl at the front desk, was also very enthusiastic. I told her the truth about the stay and mentioned that the shower water in the room was sometimes cold and sometimes hot. I hope the hotel can improve. If I come to Beijing to play next time, I will choose to stay again!

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Room (2 beds)
info:Stayed in April 2024
info:Business travelers
info:3 Reviews
rating:4
posted:Posted April 17, 2024
msg:The hotel is quiet and the room is clean. The double room is a bit small. The two beds are only 1.1 meters wide and almost close together, which makes sleeping a bit cramped. The hotel facilities are relatively old. There is a single sofa with metal legs next to the window, which is only about 20 centimeters away from the window (see picture). It is not very useful, but it caused me to accidentally kick the metal legs of the sofa twice when I went to bed. The first time was okay, but the second time, my toenails bled. I immediately called the front desk for help, but the bedside phone was disconnected and there was no dial tone. I had to ask my companion to go to the front desk to get an iodine cotton swab. No staff of the hotel took the initiative to follow up and ask for help. Overall, as a hotel for business trips, there is no big problem, but the hotel facilities and services are not very matched with the price of 1400+.

msg:During the short holiday, I stayed in the city and found a hotel package at Yansha Kempinski, which was 1400+, including breakfast, river view room, afternoon tea, parking space, etc. It felt very worthwhile~

Old hotel, the room is smaller than the average five-star hotel, and the river view is facing the China Zun. The highlights are the catering, the sky pool (18th floor) and the service of the red-dressed lady at the front desk. Because it was not cleaned up after 3 o'clock, three lobby bar drink coupons were given as a compliment.

The breakfast was good, the environment was good and there were few people. The afternoon tea was originally worth more than 400, the product was stable, the taste and appearance were online, and it was much better than the average Internet celebrity dessert shop. You have to queue up at Kempinski's bakery at night.

Downstairs is the Liangma River light show and the cruise ship pier, which is very convenient, and there are many restaurants and shopping around.

name:C‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçf‚Äçf‚Äç_‚ÄçZ
info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in June 2023
info:Solo travelers
info:14 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 24, 2023
msg:It is a hotel full of details and high cost performance.

The first time I came into contact with the Kempinski brand was in Bangkok, Thailand, where one was north of Siam Paragon and the other was next to Kimpton. The reviews are very good.

Speaking of Lufthansa Kempinski, I am very satisfied with a few details:
One is to take the initiative to turn down the bed, which is very good. Every time I return to the hotel at night, I find that the turndown has been turned down, the towels used before have been replaced with new ones, the mineral water has been replenished, and the lights in the room have been adjusted , made me feel very warm. I have stayed in many hotels, and usually the hotel will help turn the bed down when the guest requests it. Except for this hotel, the only one I have experienced is the Kimpton in Bangkok who took the initiative to turn down the bed.
Second, the service is good. I called to ask for two bottles of mineral water, and I would take the initiative to deliver four bottles. You can order takeaway at ordinary times, and you can also use the robot to deliver it through the concierge depar**ent. I also asked the hotel for two paper bags for gift giving, and the design of the hotel's paper bags is also good.
The third is that the room decoration is good. As an old hotel that opened in 1992, after being renovated in 19 years, the room is very warm and cozy. Although the room is not big, it makes people feel visually because of the large amount of mirrors and glass. very nice.
Fourth, the location of the hotel is good, just next to the Liangmaqiao subway station. After exiting the subway station, you can walk through the Friendship Shopping Center to reach the hotel directly, without going around from the outside. It is also very convenient to go to and from the Capital Airport. From Terminal 2 of the Capital Airport, take the Airport Express Line to Sanyuan Bridge for one stop, and transfer to Line 10 for one stop to Liangma Bridge to arrive at the hotel.
Fifth, the price is very cost-effective. At the same price level, especially in the location of the East Third Ring Road in Chaoyang District, it is difficult to find a better hotel with this kind of service and this kind of hardware.

To sum up, Lufthansa Kempinski is my treasure hotel in Beijingüëç

msg:The five-star hotel that our family stayed in for the first time 30 years ago was in Kempinski. For us, Kempinski is not only a hotel, but also integrated with Beijing. This time I came to Beijing to relax and revisit deliberately to feel the beauty of the past.
Check-in: The front desk staff checks in quickly, professionally and politely.
Fitness: When I was looking for a swimming pool, I met a lady in the gym who enthusiastically took me upstairs.
Facilities: refurbished luxury rooms with a full set of German GROHE bathrooms, electronic shower curtains, and wet and dry separation. 5100 mineral water and TWG tea bags are very good, the kettle is very clean and has a heat preservation function, and the TV is a standard international channel for foreign hotels.
Hygiene: Every part of the hotel is clean and tidy, and flowers can be seen in public areas and guest rooms.
Service: There is a turndown service when you return to the hotel in the evening. There are a variety of complimentary fruit plates and desserts, as well as Beijing-style Facebook.
Breakfast: There is a special egg menu, with rich choices of recipes and side dishes! There are many kinds of fruits, and the juice is freshly squeezed. The service staff will immediately ask if you want coffee and bring it to your seat after you are seated. very good!
Food Gallery: This is the memory of 30 years. The authentic cakes, breads and all kinds of ham and sausages all reveal the heritage of the hotel. worth a visit!
In short, this is an international five-star foreign-related hotel with stable performance. During this short stay in Beijing, both Alen Zuo and other staff left a deep impression on me. Especially when I was pulling the suitcase and met the housekeeping staff saying goodbye to me, I was really sad! Next time I come to Beijing, I will stay again!

info:Deluxe Room River View King

rating:2
posted:Posted May 6, 2023
msg:First of all, I am very sorry, because the child did not eat well on the night of check-in, and he started to vomit in the middle of the night, and vomited three or four times, so he made the bed and towels dirty, I am very sorry.

Let's talk about the advantages: the location is good, next to the Liangma River. Metro station is also very close. An old five-star hotel with no problem with facilities.

But there are many places worth complaining about:
In short, it is very unsuitable to travel with children!

1. There is no elevator in the underground garage to go directly to the hotel. You need to take the stairs, go outdoors first, and then enter through the main entrance. Although it's not far away, it was really inconvenient for us to push a stroller, so we finally got in from a small internal elevator of the staff.
2. The initiative of the staff is poor. After getting on the elevator, a waitress may not think that we are staying in the hotel. It doesn‚Äôt matter if you say hello or not. We took the initiative to ask where the check-in is. In the process, we missed going downstairs on the first floor and finally checked in on the 15th floor. , and went back to the first floor to get the voucher for afternoon tea for two. When I was at the front desk on the first floor, I took the initiative to explain the purpose of my visit. The service staff just said to wait a moment, and then began to busy with her affairs. After waiting for a few minutes, I asked again if I was doing it here, and she said yes, and then I started to work on her work, maybe I thought we had waited too long, so I did it for us, and I asked what to do when I came up, cooperating with what I just said was useless.
3. The quality of the afternoon tea for two is poor and the service is slow. It can be seen that this afternoon tea should not be their main recommendation. Basically, no one ordered it, and they all came with the set meal, so we waited for half an hour before eating. The waiters here are not bad.
4. The room was not cleaned well. A child walked in the room barefoot and picked up a small transparent piece for me. I couldn't tell whether it was plastic or glass. It was really dangerous. It can be seen that the room was not cleaned cleanly.
5. The design of the facilities in the room is not very humane. For example, the sink is very shallow and it is easy to splash water. For example, there is a paper drawer in the room except for the bathroom, and there is no drawer in other places, which is inconvenient to use. In addition, the shaking of the bed is very sensitive, and it will affect others when turning over.
6. The room we live in is very small. After entering the aisle, there is a luggage desk, which hinders a lot of space. As a result, it is only 50-60 cm away from that aisle, and it is very inconvenient to enter and exit.

The glass in the room is not soundproof, and the north-facing rooms are not friendly to guests with poor sleep quality. The parking lot in the hotel is relatively tight. The parking fee is 8 yuan per hour and there is no discount policy for hotel guests.

The second is the location of the hotel. It is very pleasant to take a boat trip by the Liangma River or go to the tavern on the other side of the river for a drink at night. It takes less than 20 minutes to walk along the river to the blue port. Again, the soft drinks in the hotel refrigerator are The free mineral water is not enough to drink and can be renewed for free. The most important point is that there is no charge for parking, which is really friendly to hotel guests. The only dissatisfaction is that the gym is not yet open. I hope that the gym can be used next time you stay.

msg:Very good old five-star, newly renovated. The king of cost performance, the green plants outside the window are rare in five-star hotels in Beijing.

It is recommended that the toiletries on the executive floor be used at a high-end point, the icing on the cake.

I didn't edit the picture and I was lazy and went straight to it.

Very close to the blue port, take a cruise by the way, and the place to disembark is just below the hotel. Birthday events can be arranged one day and one night.

Although there are not many varieties for breakfast, you can definitely trust the quality of the first bakery in Beijing.

In addition to the old Lufthansa Shopping Center next door, there is also a small and fashionable rookie shopping mall "Guanshe" across the road to buy niche clothing brands, as well as bookstore coffee.

name:A‚Äçn‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçy‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in February 2022
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted February 6, 2022
msg:Take the baby to stay in the Kempinski Deluxe King Room, and the overall experience is satisfactory. Let's talk about the advantages first - stay: the hotel is in a good location, the room is facing the Liangma River (when I checked in, I told the front desk to ask for a quiet room, it is really quiet, thank you), the scenery is very good. The bathtub is big and clean, and it is very comfortable to take a bath with a baby. The toilet is the same as my house. The room service is very good. After dinner, I came back to replenish the mineral water, tea bags, shower gel, cleaned the hygiene, made the bed, and it was very tidy. The point is that the drinks in the refrigerator are all free, really. Eat: The breakfast is rich, there are many kinds of distinctive sausages, beef slices, ham slices, bread, cereals, jams, and children should like it more. For dinner, we ate at the hotel‚Äôs own restaurant, Prana Beer Hall. The bread basket comes with three kinds of sauces for free, the yellow beer is refreshing, the fried pork knuckle ham is bold, and the salad with parsley seeds (forgot the name) relieves the tiredness and eats a lot. satisfy. Best of all, in-house guests get 20% off all restaurants. In addition, there is a 150 food hall quota in the room voucher, and you can also enjoy a 20% discount, which is equivalent to buying the regular price of 187.5 yuan in the food hall. It is really too real to have to praise the hotel again! ! In the food hall, you can buy cakes, breads, chocolates, and cheese sausages. We bought black forest cake, fruit cream yolk cake, two croissants, a donut, a small sausage, and it came back full. Play: The swimming pool on the 18th floor has a wide view, good water quality, not many people, and a sauna room. But reservation is required. Now let's talk about the disadvantages. Ha-stay: Not very friendly to children. For example: the height of the table top and the table top in the room will touch the head of a child over one year old, and there is no anti-collision angle. Parents need to pay special attention. The faucet and safety handle of the bathtub are on the side of the long side, and it is easy to touch children. Play: The depth of the swimming pool is 1.6 meters and there is no slope. If you play with children, parents must be at least 1.8 meters before they can step on the ground calmly. If the baby can swim or is willing to sit on the swimming ring, this can be ignored. In addition, in the ladies' bathroom in the swimming area, there is a faucet with hot and cold water signs that are reversed, but the hot water is actually on the right. correct! The front desk helped to delay the check-out until two o'clock, and it's easier to bring the baby, thank you! Thinking of this for a while, I hope the above information is useful to you.
----------------------------------------

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Double Room
info:Stayed in January 2022
info:Friends
info:3 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted January 3, 2022
msg:As a veteran five-star hotel, the overall experience is not bad and will not be reviewed. The service is good, but the hardware facilities are poor.

Let me talk about the good places first:
1. The temperature of the swimming pool on the top floor is comfortable and the water is relatively clear. The swimming pool is small and delicate. There is also a well-sealed sauna room on the top bathing area, which is great.
2. When the front desk answers the phone, the last name will be given. The details here are full marks.
3. Masks and hand sanitizers are prepared in the room, very careful.
4. At night, there will be service staff to help add ice to the refrigerator, draw the curtains, etc.
5. Drinks in the refrigerator are free.

Disadvantages:
1. Room hardware facilities are outdated, carpets and sofas are very old.
2. There is no floor drain in the toilet, so the floor will accumulate water, which is very slippery.
3. The TV in the room is at the level of an express hotel. . . The screen is very unclear. .
4. Audio is installed in the bathroom, but the room is not installed, so that the TV sound heard in the bathroom is louder than in the room, but the TV is not seen in the bathroom. . . It is recommended to install a speaker in the room, and let the bathroom sound can be adjusted separately.
5. The location of the glass installation in the bathtub is very inconvenient, and it is very inconvenient to use the nozzle.
6. The faucet in the bathroom is too short, and part of the water will flow onto the countertop. I accidentally saw this phenomenon in a five-star hotel.
7. The cold water switch in the bathing area on the top floor is reversed, and the red area is cold water. It is very unexpected that this kind of bug appears in five-star hotels. .

msg:For hotels booked during the Spring Festival, please consult the hotel staff in advance about whether the salon suite can be arranged for parents and children and participate in cooking classes. The hotel staff can answer yes. But then the reservation was made, and the hotel staff changed their caliber. Later, through the coordination of Ctrip, it was finally resolved satisfactorily. But it always makes me uncomfortable.
The room facilities in the salon suite are very modern and should have been renovated for the second time. I am very satisfied. It is said that many people in the executive lounge have been transferred to support the Winter Olympics, so I feel that the service has not kept up, which is regrettable, but understandable. The happyhour scene in the executive lounge is very chaotic, there are too many guests, the catering is not provided in time, the number of staff is limited, and the executive lounge is very noisy.
There is a small outdoor garden and a smaller outdoor area for children. Rare in urban areas.
Maybe because of the Spring Festival ‚ûï Winter Olympics, I didn't have a particularly good experience. I may come back at a different time next time I have the opportunity.

msg:Check in on the 12th and check out at 2:00 pm on the 16th Two nights of executive two nights luxury Praise to the executive lounge team and the Prana restaurant team, including the non-Beijing housekeeper who was warm, thoughtful, courteous and courteous. You can see this person at the side counter here, taking all the orders for express delivery. During the check-in period, I heard this while I was sitting on the sofa next to the counter to pick up the express delivery. I have huge power, I can't imagine that I felt the inexplicable sense of superiority of this David just after checking out. I checked out at two o'clock and waited in the lobby. It was estimated that I would leave the store at 5 o'clock in the afternoon. When I went to the airport, I ordered a takeaway to treat myself. And the lobby environment, including the respect of other customers, asked David if he could arrange a place where he could have a simple meal, whether it was the restaurant, the interior of the lobby bar, or other places. David told me that it was not possible to go to the sofa next to the elevator in the third-floor conference room. I tried to go up and found There are no tables and the sofa area is full due to the auction. After the staff went downstairs, they asked for help again. David told me that I could go to the garden on the east side to eat. The weather was sunny and sunny at 2:00 and 30 degrees. I told the garden that there was no shade and there was no suitable place. David arrogantly and unreasonably told me to look for the shade by myself. I asked if there was a table. David replied rudely that there were chairs. I honestly said that I was instantly annoyed. I asked David, then should I eat it on the top of my head? After David turned his head and left, I found the Pula that I had eaten Na restaurant explained the reason: I just checked out and hope to borrow a table for a simple meal I handed it over to the service girl at Prana and thanked each other. After returning to the lobby, I took a picture of David with my mobile phone and told it that I would 100% give the hotel a bad review because of it. David then told the manager on duty that he was humble and polite. After a frank exchange and expecting to solve the problem, I also realized that I was looking for help from the wrong person from the beginning, but the hotel is a whole. The customer experience is composed of the products or services provided by each depar**ent and each employee. The locomotive has arrived and we have to rush to the airport. Before we leave, David is still arrogant and pointed out that my filming violates privacy. I admit that there is something wrong and tell the other party that I can call the police. I don‚Äôt need any material or other equivalent compensation from the hotel. But I think it is necessary to show the face and behavior of these people so that other staying passengers can make a judgment. Traveling is pleasant, not for the sake of embarrassment. I reflect: maybe because I have checked out, I don‚Äôt deserve to have mutual respect. Next time I will Also try to avoid not offering service after check-out to help domestic and foreign hotels for the first time on Ctrip to give an evaluation authenticity personality guarantee typos, please forgive me! The hotel side must stop whitewashing, denying or high-sounding. If you have to say something human, don‚Äôt just add more disgust like responding to other reviews, because customer reviews are for the hotel to better serve others and are well-intentioned!
